short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fixed shooter in which the player moves a laser cannon horizontally across the bottom of the screen and fires at aliens overhead.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Here's a blast from the past (excuse the pun) and a good old favourite retro arcade game which is free for you to play from Andover Patio Centre.

Take a break with this retro arcade game and play Space Invaders for free. Enjoy!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Space Invaders extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Space Invaders icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Space Invaders popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
Space Invaders is a fixed shooter in which the player moves a laser cannon horizontally across the bottom of the screen and fires at aliens overhead.
